 2008-02302008-02-07,  ,  ,  ,  PSEP
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAppointment of LOUIS-PHILIPPE McGRAW of Mazerolle Settlement, New Brunswick, to be a full-time member of the National Parole Board, Atlantic Regional Division, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and designation of LOUIS-PHILIPPE McGRAW as Vice-Chairperson of the National Parole Board, Atlantic Regional Division, effective February 11, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
